33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Simak bin Harb narrated from Jabir bin Samurah who said " The Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) said:'There will be twelve Amir after me."' He said: "Then he said something that I did not understand. So I asked the one who was next to me, who said that he(s.a.w) had said: 'All of them are from Quraish

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Al-Khulafa'
